charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed deep into the
mountains for some special training.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1101_020: At first, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] thought [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was alone, but...
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_030:
Oh! Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Did you come here to hang out?
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0401_050: I see! You’re working hard, huh.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0402_070:
Aw, shucks. I thought you were here to have fun,
like us.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_080: We like to hang out and play around here a lot.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_090:
As head of the Looker Bureau, I have to make
sure we’re able to respond immediately in case
an incident happens...
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_100: So I’m playing tag here with Crobat to train up!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0401_120: Right?! Crobat’s four wings are sharp and cool!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0402_140:
Right?! Even in a narrow cave, it can fly around
super fast!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_150: I got my Crobat from the old man, actually.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0401_170:
Oh, right. I guess you wouldn’t know who I’m
talking about.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_200:
I’m talking about Dr. Xerosic! He’s the one who
hired me for a part-time job back in Kalos!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_210: Dr. Xerosic was a bad guy at the time...
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_220:
But even outside of work, he was super nice
to me!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_230:
Thanks to Crobat and the other Pokémon he
gave me...
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_240:
Even today, me and Dr. Xerosic have been
connected, even if that connection can’t be seen!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_250: I’m sure I’ll see him again someday!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0401_270:
Uh-huh! In order to make that happen, I’m gonna
keep doing my best as the head of the bureau!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0402_300:
But it’s top secret, so he probably wouldn’t
tell me.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_310:
Oh! Also, there’s another thing Dr. Xerosic gave
me that connects us.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_320:
I bet the day I can show it to you will come
eventually, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_330:
But for now, I’ll keep hanging out here, playing
with Mimi and Crobat while we wait for
Dr. Xerosic!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0301_340: What kind of games do you play?
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_380: After we run around a bunch...
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_390:
I let everyone out of their Poké Balls, and we all
curl up and take a nap!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1201_400:
As long as we’re together, it’s nice and warm,
even when we’re outdoors!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0401_420:
Uh-huh! I’m sure it’d be fun if you joined us, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_0402_440:
Heeey! You’re saying exactly what Mr. Looker
would say! I’m totally fine!
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1101_450:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] felt something
staring at [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]. [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] looked down near Emma’s feet
and locked eyes with Mimi.
charaepi_ch0220_00_matiere/2301_1101_470:
it seemed as if Mimi was trying to say,
“Please take care of Emma.”
